dct_description_sm: Printed with vegetation. Prepared under the direction of the Chief of Engineers by the Army Map Service (GE), Corps of Engineers, Department of the Army , [topography] by U. S. Geological Survey. Variant title: Indiana 1:25,000. Filing title: Hope, Indiana. Standard map series designation: AMS (Series) V851 Sheet 3862 IV SE. AMS 1. Transverse Mercator projection. "A.M.S. series , V851." Relief shown by contours and spot heights. Shows roads, railroads, boundaries, buildings, and natural features. Contour interval 10 feet. Marginal maps: Index to boundaries.--Index to adjoining sheets. "Topography by plane-table methods by the U. S. Geological Survey 1946-1947. Horizontal and vertical control by USGS and USC&GS. Public Land Survey lines are based on the Second Principal Meridian and Base Line." "N3915-W8545/7.5." "Type C (AMS 1), 1947." "7-48."
Imprint: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, Corps of Engineers, Department of the Army, 1948.
Dimensions: 56 x 45 cm or smaller; Scale: 1:25,000
dct_creator_sm: United States. Army Map Service; Geological Survey (U.S.)
